backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the BizForge AI backend with six query functions: generateBrandNames, generateLogoConcept, generateMarketingContent, analyzeSentiment, generateColorPalette, and askChatbot, all returning hardcoded stub data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single feature task to diagnose and fix the 10-variant logo showcase in LogoConceptGenerator.tsx and useLogoRenderer.ts, listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of short descriptions for each frontend source file, covering CSS, Tailwind config, hooks, layout components, and all six tool components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, sidebar, chart, and other design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'BizForge AI' that mounts the React app at the #root div and loads src/main.tsx as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing active tool state and rendering AppLayout with a ToolView switch that maps ToolId values to the six tool components.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout shell composing the Sidebar, a hero header with a background image, a scrollable main content area for children, and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive sidebar component with BizForge AI branding, navigation buttons for all six tools with active gold highlighting, mobile overlay toggle, and an AI engine status indicator in the footer.
frontend/src/components/tools/BrandingCh: A chat interface component that lets users ask branding and marketing questions, supporting text input, speech recognition, and displaying structured AI responses in a scrollable message thread.
frontend/src/components/tools/BrandNameG: A React component that provides a form for generating 15 brand name suggestions by accepting industry, keywords, and tone inputs, then displaying the results with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/tools/ColorPalet: A React component that generates a brand color palette based on industry and tone inputs, displaying color swatches with hex values, labels, and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/tools/LogoConcep: A React component that generates logo concept data from brand name, industry, and tone inputs, then renders 10 SVG logo style variants with individual PNG download buttons.
frontend/src/components/tools/MarketingC: A React component that generates marketing copy (social captions, ad text, etc.) from brand name, product description, target audience, and tone inputs, displaying results in copyable content blocks.
frontend/src/components/tools/SentimentA: A React component that provides a UI for analyzing customer review sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) by submitting text to the backend and displaying color-coded results with confidence scores.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogoRenderer.ts: Defines logo rendering functions (wordmark, lettermark, emblem, icon-wordmark) that generate SVG React elements based on a LogoConcept and brand name, exported as named logo variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query mutation hooks for all backend AI operations: brand name generation, logo concept, marketing content, sentiment analysis, color palette, and chatbot queries.
A custom hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript capture, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for a dark-first design system with gold accent tokens and utility classes for gradients, glows, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single cn utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the BizForge frontend, defining dark mode, custom color tokens (using oklch), typography, border radius, box shadows, and keyframe animations with plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for BizForge AI tracking version 13, listing all existing features (brand name generator, logo concept, marketing content, sentiment analysis, color palette, chatbot, voice input), architectural notes, and known issues with the logo output feature.
